questions.question_text: What is the click path to enable Enhance Profile Management?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Formula cannot use another formula field that directly or indirectly refers to itself

The Custom Formula field can use another custom formula field. However it can not use itself. Tried to create a custom formula field on standard account object using another custom formula field. It worked well, no errors. However then tried to use the same field in the formula, it gave the error " Error: Formula cannot use another formula field that directly or indirectly refers to itself."
Then would not the answer be 'A'

can a custom formula field reference another custom formula field? Yes, custom fields can referenced/used in other custom fields -- as long as the two fields have some sort of relationship (i.e. the are on related objects).

questions.question_text: Custom formula fields can reference other custom formula fields including themselves.
